org.cucumber.tt

Interface TrainSort

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleTrainSort

    public interface TrainSort
    Interface for train sorting algorithms. Simple sorting algorithm for sorting cars in a train using only 3 train tracks. Rules: - Stacks are used to represent the railroads. - You can only add cars in input track. - No duplicate IDs. - IDs only range from 0 to 9. - Cars can use any track to push the car in.
    Author:
    nlopez
